paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Create PostgreSQL Database
**Objective:** Create a PostgreSQL database, Cloudfin
**File locations:** hostname:~/tmp/cloudfin
**Successful outcome:** Create a relational database
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Zeppelin

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Create PostgreSQL Database
Objective: Create a PostgreSQL database, Cloudfin
File locations: hostname:~/tmp/cloudfin
Successful outcome: Create a relational database
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Zeppelin

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup

msg.data: Setup

paragraphs.title: 1 - List the cloudfin dataset
paragraphs.text:
%sh

ls /var/data/cloudfin

msg.data:
claim_saving.tar.gz
consent_data.tar.gz
employee.tar.gz
eu_country.tar.gz
provider_summary.tar.gz
tax.tar.gz
us_customer.tar.gz
ww_customer.tar.gz

paragraphs.title: 2 - Create tmp directory
paragraphs.text:
%sh

rm -r /tmp/cloudfin
mkdir /tmp/cloudfin
ls /tmp/cloudfin

paragraphs.title: 3 - Use tar to extract the gz files
paragraphs.text:
%sh

tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/claim_saving.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/consent_data.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/employee.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/eu_country.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/provider_summary.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/tax.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/us_customer.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/ww_customer.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/

msg.data:

claim_saving.csv
._consent_data.csv
consent_data.csv
._employee.csv
employee.csv
._employee_raw.csv
employee_raw.csv

us_customer.csv
._ww_customer.csv
ww_customer.csv

paragraphs.title: 4 - List cloudfin data files
paragraphs.text:
%sh

ls /tmp/cloudfin

msg.data:
claim_saving.csv
consent_data.csv
employee.csv
employee_raw.csv
eu_country.csv
provider_summary.csv
tax_2016.csv
tax_2017.csv
tax_2018.csv
us_customer.csv
ww_customer.csv

paragraphs.title: 5 - Use shell Interpreter to check cloudfin tables
paragraphs.text:
%sh

export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -d cloudfin -p 5432  <<EOF
\dt
EOF

msg.data:
List of relations
 Schema |       Name       | Type  |  Owner  
--------+------------------+-------+---------
 public | claim_saving     | table | devuser
 public | consent_data     | table | devuser
 public | employee         | table | devuser
 public | eu_country       | table | devuser
 public | provider_summary | table | devuser
 public | us_customer      | table | devuser
 public | ww_customer      | table | devuser
(7 rows)

paragraphs.title: 6 - Use psql to drop tables if exists

msg.data: Query executed successfully. Affected rows : 0

paragraphs.title: 7 - Create table claim_saving
paragraphs.text:
%psql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS claim_saving;

CREATE TABLE claim_saving(
  claim_date DATE,
  last_name VARCHAR(24),
  client_id INT,
  claim_number INT,
  claim_code DECIMAL,
  claim_amount DECIMAL,
  risk_factor DECIMAL,
  claim_adjustment DECIMAL
  );

msg.data: Query executed successfully. Affected rows : 0

paragraphs.title: 8 - Load data into table claim_saving
paragraphs.text:
%sh

export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudfin <<EOF
\copy claim_saving FROM '/tmp/cloudfin/claim_saving.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER
EOF

paragraphs.title: 9 - Query table claim_saving limit 5
paragraphs.text:
%psql

SELECT * FROM claim_saving LIMIT 5;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 10 - Create table consent_data
paragraphs.text:
%psql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS consent_data;

CREATE TABLE consent_data(
  country_code VARCHAR(8),
  country VARCHAR(48),
  insurance_id INT,
  marketing_consent VARCHAR(8),
  marketing_consent_start_date DATE,
  loyalty_consent VARCHAR(8),
  loyalty_consent_start_date DATE,
  third_party_consent VARCHAR(8),
  third_party_consent_start_date DATE
  );

msg.data: Query executed successfully. Affected rows : 0

paragraphs.text:
%sh

export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudfin <<EOF
\copy consent_data FROM '/tmp/cloudfin/consent_data.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER
EOF

paragraphs.title: 13 - Create table employee
paragraphs.text:
%psql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS employee;

CREATE TABLE employee(
  emp_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(48),
  age INT,
  telephone VARCHAR(24),
  email VARCHAR(48),
  birthday DATE,
  country_code VARCHAR(8),
  salary DECIMAL
  );

msg.data: Query executed successfully. Affected rows : 0

paragraphs.text:
%sh

export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudfin <<EOF
\copy employee FROM '/tmp/cloudfin/employee.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER
EOF

paragraphs.title: 19 - Create table provider_summary
paragraphs.text:
%psql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS provider_summary;

CREATE TABLE provider_summary(
    provider_id INT,
    company_name VARCHAR(48),
    address VARCHAR(64),
    city VARCHAR(48),
    state_code VARCHAR(8),
    zip_code VARCHAR(8),
    regional_office VARCHAR(48),
    business_years INT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL,
    paid_amount DECIMAL,
    adustment_amount DECIMAL
  );

paragraphs.title: 22 - Create table us_customer
paragraphs.text:
%psql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS us_customer;

CREATE TABLE us_customer(
    customer_id INT,
    gender VARCHAR(24),
    title VARCHAR(8),
    first_name VARCHAR(64),
    middle_initial VARCHAR(8),
    last_name VARCHAR(64),
    address VARCHAR(128),
    city VARCHAR(64),
    state_code VARCHAR(8),
    state VARCHAR(64),
    zip_code VARCHAR(12),
    country_code VARCHAR(8),
    country VARCHAR(64),
    email VARCHAR(64),
    username VARCHAR(24),
    password VARCHAR(24),
    telephone VARCHAR(24),
    telephone_country_code VARCHAR(4),
    mother_maiden VARCHAR(64),
    birthday DATE,
    age INT,
    tropical_zodiac VARCHAR(24),
    cc_type VARCHAR(24),
    cc_number VARCHAR(24),
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires DATE,
    national_id VARCHAR(12),
    mrn VARCHAR(64),
    insurance_id INT,
    eye_color VARCHAR(12),
    occupation VARCHAR(128),
    company VARCHAR(64),
    vehicle VARCHAR(64),
    domain VARCHAR(64),
    blood_type VARCHAR(4),
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    );

msg.data: Query executed successfully. Affected rows : 0

paragraphs.title: 25 - Create table ww_customer
paragraphs.text:
%psql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ww_customer;

CREATE TABLE ww_customer(
    customr_id INT,
    title VARCHAR(8),
    first_name VARCHAR(64),
    middle_initial VARCHAR(4),
    last_name VARCHAR(64),
    name_set VARCHAR(24),
    address VARCHAR(128),
    city VARCHAR(64),
    state_code VARCHAR(8),
    state VARCHAR(64),
    zip_code VARCHAR(12),
    country_code VARCHAR(8),
    country VARCHAR(64),
    telephone_country_code VARCHAR(4),
    telephone VARCHAR(24),
    email VARCHAR(64),
    username VARCHAR(24),
    password VARCHAR(24),
    national_id VARCHAR(24),
    mrn VARCHAR(64),
    insurance_id INT,
    cc_type VARCHAR(24),
    cc_number VARCHAR(24),
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires VARCHAR(12),
    occupation VARCHAR(128),
    company VARCHAR(64),
    domain VARCHAR(64),
    vehicle VARCHAR(64),
    gender VARCHAR(12),
    mothers_maiden VARCHAR(64),
    birthday VARCHAR(12),
    tropical_zodiac VARCHAR(24),
    age INT,
    eye_color VARCHAR(12),
    blood_type VARCHAR(4),
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    );

msg.data: Query executed successfully. Affected rows : 0

paragraphs.text: %angular
